Scientific Name: Caiman crocodilus, Melanosuchus niger, Caiman yacare, Paleosuchus palpebrosus, Paleosuchus trigonatus, Caiman latirostris
Fun Fact: Has a transparent 3rd eyelid to protect eyes in the water!
Most Distinctive Feature: Eyes and nostrils located on top of the head and snout
Other Name(s): Spectacled Caiman, Black Caiman, Yacare Caiman, Cuvier's Dwarf Caiman, Smooth-Fronted Caiman, Broad-Snouted Caiman
Predators: Jaguars, wild pigs, birds of prey
Slogan: Can grow to up 6 meters long!
Name: Caiman
